title: Senator King Cotton, Próst Malone 7.28.20
itunes:title: Senator King Cotton, Próst Malone 7.28.20
description:
In episode 681, Miles and guest host Scam Goddess Laci Mosley are joined by comedian and super model Arisce Wanzer to discuss the Covid-19 vaccines, Black activists calling the Portland federal crackdown a distraction, Senator Tom Cotton targeting curriculum on slavery, Post Malone's world beer pong league, what movies are being delayed, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Anatomy Of A COVID-19 Conspiracy Theory
  2. Moderna unveiled encouraging coronavirus vaccine results. Then top execs dumped nearly $30 million of stock
  3. COVID-19 Vaccine Candidate Heads To Widespread Testing In U.S.
  4. Black activists in Portland call federal crackdown a 'distraction' from police reform efforts
  5. Bill by Sen. Tom Cotton targets curriculum on slavery
  6. POST MALONE WORLD BEER PONG LEAGUE'S MY DREAM ... Closer to Reality!!!
  7. James Cameron “Disappointed” About ‘Avatar’ Delays, Promises Sequels “Will Deliver”
  8. Disney Delays Mulan Indefinitely, Avatar Sequels Pushed Back
  9. ‘A Quiet Place 2,’ ‘Top Gun: Maverick’ Delayed Until 2021
  10. Amid Theater Chaos, Indie Films ‘Unhinged’ and ‘Fatima’ Forge Ahead
  11. Sorry, there won’t be any good films until the US sorts itself out
  12. WATCH: Unhinged Trailer #1 (2020) | Movieclips Trailers
  13. ‘Unhinged’ Sets August Release In Wake Of ‘Tenet’s Labor Day Weekend Plan
  14. How Russell Crowe's Temper Got Its Nasty Reputation: Fighting, Yelling, Phone-Throwing and a Decade of Resentment
  15. WATCH: Acoustic Alchemy: "One For The Road"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
